query:
query getSubCategory($categoryId: String!, $subCategoryId: String!, $priceVersion: String!, $withBasePly: Boolean, $source: String, $city: String, $cancelledSuborder: Boolean) {
  getSubCategory(categoryId: $categoryId, subCategoryId: $subCategoryId, priceVersion: $priceVersion, withBasePly: $withBasePly, source: $source, city: $city, cancelledSuborder: $cancelledSuborder) {
    id
    name
    fieldData {
      fieldName
      fieldValue
      __typename
    }
    wastagePercentage
    price
    mov
    categoryMov
    hdsAction
    hasScVisuals
    pricingInclusion
    additionalInfo
    haveLength
    haveBreadth
    haveHeight
    haveQuantity
    howToQuote
    priceFormula
    isSequential
    haveTx
    __typename
    options {
      optionId
      title
      type
      isRequire
      price
      values {
        title
        price
        priceType
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    images
    uom
  }
}
